label: Iron concentration in a soil sample by colorimetric analysis using ortho-phenanthroline
definition: Iron(II) solution derived from a soil sample (via digestion and dilution) using a quantitative reaction with ortho-phenantroline and product color measurement of absorbance at 510 nm
comment: Iron(II) solution --> iron + acqueous; soil sample; o-phenantroline;at 510 nm-> at 510 nm wavelength
